name: Pharaoh's Trap
description:
My Father and I joined the Las Vegas Summer Game Jam 2019 and finished this game in 2 days!

I programmed the game and also did the level design, while my Dad drew and animated the game. It was a really fun experience and we learned a lot from this! If you ever ever thought about joining a game jam, I say go for it! You'll meet a lot of people and get a lot of new ideas!

We didn't have enough time to finish and implement all of our idea's but we got a playable game out after these 2 days.

The music is from this YouTube video!

I hope you enjoy the game! Feedback is appreciated!

Controls: ActionKeyboardPS4 ControllerMovement
A and D
Left Stick
JumpSpaceX
SubmitSpaceX
